attributes.action: any immagrant illegal or not commiting crimes in the uk to be deported straight away
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it will free up jail spaces plus save the taxpayer loads of money if instead of funding forign criminals who are members of criminal gangs or just a danger to the public should be deported straight away after a fair trial

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/search?q=deport
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
